taskTitle: Add Electrobun/Playwright Golden Loop smoke for start/stop & log UI

subtasks.description:
Implement: Add Electrobun/Playwright Golden Loop smoke for start/stop & log UI

Create a browser/electron integration test that launches the desktop UI, starts a one-task Golden Loop run with a stub project, verifies live log/phase output appears, and confirms graceful stop/cleanup behavior.

Add tests for: Add Electrobun/Playwright Golden Loop smoke for start/stop & log UI

Verify the implementation works correctly with unit tests.
